dt: {bc}the {a_link|misnaming} of a person in a legal instrument
{bc}a use of a wrong or inappropriate name

dt.t: Nowadays it is a {wi}misnomer{/wi} to call a farmer a peasant.
The name "Greenland" is a {wi}misnomer{/wi}, since much of the island is covered by a massive ice sheet.

et: Middle English {it}misnoumer{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}mesnomer{/it}, from {it}mes-{/it} mis- + {it}nomer{/it} to name, from Latin {it}nominare{/it} {ma}{mat|nominate|}{/ma}
shortdef: the misnaming of a person in a legal instrument
a use of a wrong or inappropriate name
a wrong name or inappropriate designation
